query.sql: with date_partitions as (select dbms_xmlgen.getxmltype(' select p.table_owner, p.table_name, p.partition_name, p.high_value, p.subpartition_count, p.tablespace_name, p.compression, p.compress_for, p.last_analyzed from dba_part_key_columns k, dba_tab_cols c, dba_tab_partitions p where k.owner = c.owner and k.column_name = c.column_name and k.name = c.table_name and k.owner = p.table_owner and k.name = p.table_name and (c.data_type = ''DATE'' or c.data_type like ''TIMESTAMP%'')') as xml from dual), table_info as( SELECT x.*, to_date(substr(x.high_value, instr(x.high_value, '''')+2, 19), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')part_high_date FROM date_partitions p, xmltable('/ROWSET/ROW' passing p.xml columns table_owner varchar2(30) path '/ROW/TABLE_OWNER', table_name varchar2(30) path '/ROW/TABLE_NAME', partition_name varchar2(30) path '/ROW/PARTITION_NAME', subpartition_count number path '/ROW/SUBPARTITION_COUNT', high_value varchar2(30) path '/ROW/HIGH_VALUE', tablespace_name varchar2(30) path '/ROW/TABLESPACE_NAME', compression varchar2(20) path '/ROW/COMPRESSION', compress_for varchar2(30) path '/ROW/COMPRESS_FOR', last_analyzed varchar2(30) path '/ROW/LAST_ANALYZED' ) x ) select * from table_info order by table_owner,table_name,part_high_date desc
